edu.umd.cs.piccolox.swing
Class PScrollPane.PScrollAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      edu.umd.cs.piccolox.swing.PScrollPane.PScrollAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action
Enclosing class:
PScrollPane
protected static class PScrollPane.PScrollAction
extends AbstractAction

Action to scroll left/right/up/down. Modified from javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicScrollPaneUI.ScrollAction Gets the view parameters (position and size) from the Viewport rather than directly from the view - also only performs its actions when the relevant scrollbar is visible

See Also:
Serialized Form

          1 indicates scroll down, -1 up.
